data.text: @ENQuiderJr @HullHospitals @NHSEngland @laateh I agree @ENQuiderJr so pleased (and proud) that Riz is one of our first PNAs. (Although he has no idea how hard I might be working him now 🤣🤣).
@HullHospitals @NHSEngland Well done to you all 1st batch of PNAs and incredibly proud of my compatriot friend, Riz! BAME staff represented @laateh! Keep it up! 🙌🌟
@HullHospitals @NHSEngland So lovely to see everybody - well done to them all ❤️

@HullHospitals @NHSEngland Congratulations to first cohort of PNA’s @HullHospitals #proud that despite the operational challenges they have achieved & are delivering support to front line teams 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼@CNOEngland
